characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: When attacking with this weapon, you can shoot either the boltgun, the plasma blaster, or both. If you fire both, subtract 1 from all hit rolls made for this weapon. In either case, each time you fire the plasma blaster, choose either the standard or supercharge profile; if you roll any hit rolls of 1 when firing a supercharged plasma blaster, the bearer is slain after all the weaponâ€™s shots have been resolved
